name: Chantal Cleroux
who_you_serve: women from all communities, races, ethnicities and religions
social_proof: Kristyn Wong-Tam [MPP], Magda Juliana Diaz [Mentor and Executive Coach], Michael Challenger [CEO @ Optimal Living Summit | Best Selling Author, Motivational Speaker], Tara Myshrall [Mentor, Board Member], Chantal Cleroux [Financial Capacity, Architect Key Francophone Leader IWB]
business_focus: Celebrating the achievements of women, raising awareness about gender equality, and taking action to accelerate progress toward a more inclusive and equitable world.
